idea-plugin.name: AES_Plugin
idea-plugin.description:
You may be used eclipse ide for android development early. And you may remember android eclipse snippets. Now these snippets come to android studio and as well as intellij ide
Install this plugin reopen your ide and in your java code type something like aes_... or just click ctrl+j. caution: some codes do not work for latest android versions. android eclipse snippets java code live templates
idea-plugin.change-notes:
First release.
android eclipse snippets java code live templates plugin
